artist: Hasegawa Settan; Hasegawa Settei; Author: Saitō Gesshin; Publisher: Suharaya Ihachi
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
life_date: Hasegawa Settan, Japanese, 1778–1843; Hasegawa Settei, Japanese, 1819–1882; Saitō Gesshin, Author, Japanese, 1804–1878; Suharaya Ihachi, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock printed book, ink on paper
portfolio: Records of Annual Events in the Eastern Capital (Tōto saijiki 東都歳事記)
text: Five-volume publication on the festivals in Edo with texts and illustrations. The illustrations are by Settan who was helped by Settei.
title: Records of Annual Events in the Eastern Capital, vol. 4 Autumn
